message: Let's start fair, I take the lion's share, but I'm open to negotiation.
Let's split the difference. I'm willing to give you a good chunk, but I want to make sure I get a fair share too.
Let's try a more even split.  I'm willing to come down from my initial offer, but I still need a significant share to make this worthwhile.
I'm coming closer to your offer.  Let's meet in the middle and make this happen.
